# The `User` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user">sandboxir::User</a> has operands. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Protected Member Functions

### getOperandUseDefault() {#a8014de6610ee432b675e3819e011acb2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Use llvm::sandboxir::User::getOperandUseDefault (unsigned OpIdx, bool Verify) const"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
\\Returns the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a> edge that corresponds to <code>OpIdx</code>.

Note: This is the default implementation that works for instructions that match the underlying LLVM instruction. All others should use a different implementation.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/user-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/user-h">User.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/user-cpp/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/user-cpp">User.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getOperandUseInternal() {#aa469c4f23b78900ac9135b3417819f31}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual Use llvm::sandboxir::User::getOperandUseInternal (unsigned OpIdx, bool Verify) const"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
\\Returns the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a> for the <code>OpIdx&#39;th</code> operand.

This is virtual to allow instructions to deviate from the LLVM IR operands, which is a requirement for sandboxir Instructions that consist of more than one LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/user-h/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/user-h">User.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
